text: I Ægelreþ ðurh Godes ge ealra Einglalandes ane king, & ealra ðere ylande, ðe ðær to beliggat.
For mine saule alisendnesse gean cristes chirican inne Ghantwareberi landas on mine gerihte, þæt is to wittenne Sandwich & Æstre.
To ðere moncken bigleue in ðe silue ministre gode seruiende, from alle worldliche ðeudome & kinges geuewiþute <briggewurke> & castelwurke.

And gif ænig is ðæt gewilnat oþþe to brekenne, oþþe to geslitende mid toþundene modignesse ðas ure gefestnunge, wite he hine silfe amansumod fram gode, & fram eallen his halgen mid ða foreworpenen inne domes deie a christes swinste hand geloged underfang ðone dome of fordemdnesse mid ðam deofle and his ænglea.
Btan he toforan ðam deaþe mid wurþe bereusinge gebete þæt he unrihtwisliche forgilde.
Ðeos landboc wer gewriten on ðan neogn undred geare & neogan & seofentig fram ures lauordes Helende cristes akennednesse.
